seed_gen.spn_help_step_initial: Prepare the Dice(s) and make sure network is disconnected. Then click the Start button
seed_gen.div_help_step_dice_roll: Import the results of 100 dice rolls in 20 groups of 5. if you have more that 1 dice, be sure to read the results in one consistent direction (ex. left to right). insert the result of each batch by clicking on the red plus button.
seed_gen.div_help_step_gen_computer_rndm: The dice roll step is completed. Now we will take a random number from your system and generate the private key. click on the below blue button and MOVE your mouse around to add some extra randomness.
seed_gen.div_help_step_success: Your bitcoin private key and bip39 mnemonic words have been generated successfully. anything on the page will be purged after you close this window.
seed_gen.div_help_warning: NEVER save neither mnemonic words nor private key on an online computer or you will simply lose your bitcoins. To learn how to use your private key in an offline wallet, read 'Step two' of the guide in main page.
seed_gen.spn_connection_state_error:
During the seed generation process, this machine should be completely offline
Please disconnect either wifi or local network and start over
seed_gen.spn_seed_gen_consent_message: IMPORTANT: Use this tool for educational and testing porpuse if you haven't verify the digital signature of the downloaded file yourself
